During testing, submitting the following amounts will return the following statuses.

xx = any value between 0 and 2900

e-Transfer Payment
Amount	Description
xx.00	Returns an approved status notification postback.
xx.13	Returns a declined status notification postback.
xx.66	Returns a canceled status notification postback.
xx.99	Returns a expired status notification postback.
88.88	Returns a declined status with the block contact error.
13.37	Returns a declined due to the the payment being paid by a third party.
e-Transfer Payout
Amount	Description
xx.00	Returns both an approved and a claimed notification postback.
xx.13	Returns a declined status notification postback.
xx.44	Returns a returned status notification postback.
xx.55	Returns a failed status notification postback.
xx.66	Returns a canceled status notification postback.
xx.99	Returns a expired status notification postback.
88.88	Returns a declined status with the block contact error.
Visa Direct Payout
Amount	Description
0.01-2899.99	Returns an approved status.
2900+	Returns a declined status.
Visa Direct Card Eligibility
Card Number	Description
4215210195227010 (or any valid Visa Card ending in a 0)	Returns an disabled status.
4907200064555305 (or any valid Visa Card ending in a 5)	Returns an next_day status.
4563834282718009 (or any valid Visa Card ending in a 9)	Returns an next_few_days status.
